name: Ricetta: cracker di gamberetti ai fiori di sakura
desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Sakura Shrimp Crackers.

value.name: Gamberetti
value.desc: A whole piece of deep sea shrimp meat, full of nutrients and bursting with delicious flavor.

value.name: Patata
value.desc: A chunky vegetable. A gift from the earth that you never tire of with its multitude of cooking methods.

value.name: Fiore di sakura
value.desc: Fiori del Sakura sacro nel Gran Santuario di Narukami, impregnati della devozione per Inazuma.

value.name: Cracker di gamberetti ai fiori di sakura
value.desc: Crispy, crunchy crackers. Potatoes are ground into flour and added to Shrimp and Sakura Blooms before being baked in an oven. It possesses a lovely flavor profile for a snack and is beloved by people of all ages, traits that have made it a popular choice of gift.

value.text: <color=#ffffffd9>Purchase from Shimura Kanbei at Shimura's Restaurant</color>
